name: Red Wings Speed App
description:
This is the prototype of the First RED WINGS Videogame's App.

There'll be two Apps, this one and another which will be used for the gamers to accumulate points and get different kind of gifts for the Console/PC videogame.

The idea was to keep the punctuation for the future. I need to work with that ;)

The Videogame's plot line is ended yet and the cinematic or trailer is at the Youtube's link.

YOU NEED TO DOWNLOAD TO YOUR ANDROID DEVICE, INSTALL AND...

ENJOY!
